data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 14651, Version Hash: 05273b109bbf775536938c01a1ba710d1c61d86c
data.actual_result: the Alert vanishes and never reaches the Action Centre
data.expected_result: You should be able to see the Alert in the Action Centre because you have not acted on it
data.short_description: Unread Desktop Alerts in Windows 10 do not appear in the Action Centre if you missed them
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Full Alerts in a Server - Switch to another program that is NOT Discord OR switch to another Channel/Server - ask someone (or wait) to post a message in the Channel you enabled Alerts on but are not looking at - ignore the Desktop Alert but do not Dismiss it - check the Action Centre
